captions.text: Today is Pepero Day, and I [mmmm!]
As I was saying, today is Pepero day and [mmm!  That's really good]
As I was saying, today is HHSSSSSS!!!
Aaaah!
Today is Pepero Day.
Is that supposed to be a vampire or a walrus?
I'm a walrus!
So November 11th is Pepero Day, and for Pepero Day it's pretty much,
just like another version of Halloween, except you only do it with Pepero sticks.
You don't go door to door knocking and asking for candy,
you just give Pepero sticks to your family and friends that you like.
How is that anywhere close to being like Halloween?
Because it's candy related.
How about Valentine's Day?
You know what?  You don't have to correct me all the time!
So now to introduce the different kinds of Pepero:
The original Pepero classic:
For him, or for her
Mmm...Rub that chocolate all over my body.
Next we have the Almond Pepero.
Up the ante a bit.  It's a little bit pricier because it's covered with almonds
CHON WON!  That's right, Chon Won
It's delicious, looks like a turd, but doesn't taste like one.
You want to up the ante but you don't want to up it that much
because you don't care that much about the person?
Then you should go for the peanut and chocolate Pepero.
Peanuts say, I care about you to get you something covered in nuts,
but not that much.
Now for my favorite Pepero.  It's actually the naked Pepero.
You can see that there's no chocolate on the outside,
All the chocolate is on the inside of it.  Much better.
Hey baby!  [oh my!]  You're looking pretty good.
Why am I doing the girl voice?  You should be doing the girl voice.
Do not go with him!  He is a scandalous Pepero!
Go with me!  I am ze French classy Pepero! [ohhhhhhhhhkay]
Mwuoi!  I am French!  [oh my god!]  I'm so hot!
Oh my hehehehehe!  Oh stop it!
*singing* I don't want to be without you girl, neh neh neh neh neh neh
Three, two, one, jump.
WHOOOOOAAAAAAAAA
This bungie jumping was the greatest of my life whoaaaa!
*singing wedding song*
And then that was the time that I wrestled with a great white shark!
Oh, Pierre!  [Can we carry on with this video?]
You've been playing with them for like half an hour now!
Next, you can get the knockoff Pepero, such as
Really cute Hello Kitty Pepero.  Martina chose this one.
But I've never tried it before because knockoff bands don't usually taste as good.
Okay.  Oh this is kind of like a king...
this looks like a real Pepero.  This one.  It's really big though.
Now for the most important part: things you can do with your Pepero.
You're gonna get a lot of them by the end of Pepero Day,
and you're not gonna be able to eat them all,
so the best thing to do is play with them.
Alright: here we go!
Pepero sword fight.  Choose your weapon.  I chose it for you.
Are you ready? [Can I change weapons?]  No!
That's totally unfair.  Can I change weapons?
Ha!  Okay fine.  Let's fight.
HUH!! HAAHH!  HIUH HUH HUH!
Yay!  [Winner]  No, I said the first one who breaks wins.
That doesn't make any sense.  I'm gonna rewind video cassette and find out the truth.
I'm the one who's editing this video and Martina will have no say in it.
You can play baseball with the gigantically gross one that you don't want to eat.
Pepero Baseball.  [You ready?]  Throw it up!
I've never tried this before!  So...okay:
Go!  [Ready?] Yeah!
....that was a foul!  [oh that's a foul!]
Next.  [Okay ready?]  Yep.  [Can you back up?] I'm trying!
Ready?..........STRIKE ONE!
Again!  Oooh that was a foul ball.  Ready?
STRIKE TWO!  [That was a foul ball!]
STRIKE THREE!  YOU'RE OUT!
That was a foul ball!  [WHAT?!]  SHH!
Three strikes and a foul: you're beyond out.
If it's a foul ball then it's still...I'm at bat.
....Shut up!  Just throw the ball!
HOME RUN!  [Holy crap!  Where did that even go?]
I actually hit it!
Ready?  [yes]
Foul ball!  [what are you...?]
It went...out of bounds.
You can have hand free Pepero eating races.
Go!
*sounds of eating Pepero hands free*
Oh yeah!  Dragon time!
You cheated!  [why?]  You didn't chew your food.  You ate like a duck.
I ate like a man!
If you're really bored, you can just stick them up your nose:
Oh yeah!  Ohh!  Oh that's good!  Oh oh!
Oh yeah!  Oh let's get that out!  Oh, oh!  [hahaha!  That's so gross!]
Oh yeah!  Peanuty!  Actually almondy!  I got some high class boogers [that's right!]
Why not impress your friends with your mad drum playing skills?
Watch this solo Simon [oh yeah!]
*Martina makes lame drum sounds*
Isn't that impressive? I'm totally amazed with Martina's air drum skills.
I bet you are!  [you're actually spitting all over my arm]
Snare drum!  [oh my god!]
You can use them as Pepero chopsticks.  It makes all your food that much more delicious.
Make sure you don't eat the chopsticks...
Why did you eat the chopsticks?  [Because it makes your food that much more delicious!]
Ok ok try again.  Ready?  Oh oh!  Things aren't looking good here.
I got chocolate all over...oh no!
You can build Pepero houses, if you're really, really bored!
Oh no a hurricane!  [WAAHHHH!!!  I WORKED SO HARD!]
Or, you can just stick to the original spirit of Pepero Day,
and give it to somebody you love.  I love you Martina!
Thanks Ducky!  Happy Pepero Day everyone!
Wha...?  You got me the gross disgusting Hello Kitty one?
The one that's like a giant breadstick?  Why wouldn't you...
EXPECTO PATRONUS!  *POP*
Ohh!  Oh!  Is he gone?
*lame drum sounds yet again*

comments.text:
Pocky (from Japan) was created first, pepero (from S-Korea) was created 
second but got more popular and created "pepero day." In retaliation Pocky 
created "Pocky day" on 11.11. In n-california at least, pocky is more 
popular and no one really knows what pepero is. ﻿

comments.text:
In China, 11.11 is #Single# Day because the shape '1' means single and four 
'1' s means extremely single and alone. So this is usually a day of 
celebration for people who don't have a girlfriend or boyfriend, and 
couples are usually shooed if they display affection of each other 
publicly. LOL﻿
